instructions: put the dinner fork on the left side
put the dinner knife on the right side
put the salad fork on the left side of the dinner fork
put the salad knife on the right side of the dinner knife
put the soup spoon beside the salad knife
place a dessert spoon (a teaspoon) with the handle pointing to the right.
place a dessert spoon (a teaspoon) with the handle pointing to the right.
Put the dinner plate in the middle
place the bread plate above the salad fork and dinner fork
place the butter knife on the top of the bread plate with the bade facing inwards
directly above the soup spoon place the wine glass
place the water glass on the right side of dessert spoon
place the napkin on the top of the dinner plate
